title: 区块问题导致服务器崩溃
author: LiNXinYA
txt_content:
服务端版本1.12.2服务端类型：Sponge
错误报告如下。



crash-2018-10-28_14.45.15-server.txt
(13.95 KB, 下载次数: 14)



2018-10-28 14:38 上传

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
与Sponge异步光照计算有关
https://github.com/SpongePowered ... Async_Lighting.java

replies.author: LiNXinYA
replies.txt_content:
GiNYAi 发表于 2018-10-28 15:06
与Sponge异步光照计算有关
https://github.com/SpongePowered/SpongeCommon/blob/stable-7/src/main/java/o ...
我只需要把Sponge的异步光照全部关闭就可以了吗，我这里还有一份Log我发出来

replies.author: LiNXinYA
replies.txt_content:
Log.txt

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content: 关闭异步光照模块应该能回避出错的部分

replies.author: LiNXinYA
replies.txt_content:
GiNYAi 发表于 2018-10-28 15:39
关闭异步光照模块应该能回避出错的部分
已尝试，感谢！
